name: Green Tycoon Simulator (For Browser)
description:
Your job is to build low carbon energy sources to power the US. 

The game will end in the year 2140. Your final score is deaths prevented from global warming. 

All numbers and costs (except Research costs) in this game are taken from real values from industry and scientific papers.

You can swap between the solar and wind resource overlays by selecting the solar or wind build options or overlays.

Save often to prevent an undiagnosed crash that occurs on average around every 15 minutes.
